rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a north-facing entrance adhering to Vastu principles. The design includes traditional Chettinad motifs in decorative elements.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with high ceilings and ample natural light. The design integrates modern aesthetics with Chettinad influences, featuring a mix of traditional carvings and contemporary finishes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with private balcony overlooking the garden area. The design integrates traditional Chettinad motifs and modern comfort features.

rooms.name: Study/Kitchenette
rooms.description: A multifunctional space serving as both a study and kitchenette. Traditional design elements complement modern functionality.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area with proper ventilation, soundproofing and ample space for workout equipment. It is designed to promote health and wellness while preserving the aesthetic harmony of the bungalow.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet/Bathroom
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom to facilitate comfort for visitors. Includes basic amenities in line with Chettinad design.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A modern yet traditional door with intricate detailing, providing a secure and inviting entry to the bungalow.

openings.name: Window - Living Room
openings.description: Large windows that maximize natural light and provide views of the garden area.

openings.name: Window - Master Bedroom
openings.description: Well-placed windows to enhance ventilation and natural light in a private setting.

notes.vastu_alignment: The design incorporates Vastu principles by positioning the main entrance on the north side, ensuring prosperity and positive energy. Rooms are oriented with respect to cardinal directions for balance.
notes.chettinad_style: The use of local stone and traditional carvings accentuates the Chettinad aesthetic, combined with contemporary materials for enhanced functionality.
